types_of_tea.Source: Made from the camellia sinesis Tea plant, fully or almost fully oxidized
types_of_tea.Varities: Assam Tea, Earl Grey Tea, Darjeeling Tea,English Breakfast Tea
types_of_tea.Advantages: Protects lung damage caused by exposure to cigarette smoke, Expands airways making breathing easier for asthmatics, Improves brain function

types_of_tea.Source: Made from Camellia sinensis Tea plant, that have not undergone the same withering or unoxidized.
types_of_tea.Advantages: Prevents aging,Reduce Risk of Stroke, Antioxidants interferes with growth of cancers

types_of_tea.Source: Made from infused dried herbs,fruits, and flowers
types_of_tea.Advantages: Fights the Cold,Improves Digestion,Relieve Stress and Anxiety,Lower Blood Pressure

types_of_tea.Source: Made for Camellia sinensis , slightly oxidized - buds covered by minuscule white hairs are harvested
types_of_tea.Advantages: Reduce the Risk of Heart Disease,More potent anticancer properties than processed Teas, Lower risk  of insulin resistance

types_of_tea.Source: Made for Camellia sinensis plant - partially oxidized
types_of_tea.Varities: Ti Kuan Yin (Iron Goddess of Mercy),Dan Cong (Phoenix Tea)
types_of_tea.Advantages: Helps to lower cholesterol levels,Possible use as weight loss supplement, Helps people with diabetes to keep sugar level in line

types_of_tea.Source: Made from dried rooibos plant - partially oxidized
types_of_tea.Advantages: Posses some cancer fighting properties, Aids in regeneration of liver tissues, Helps to reduce cramps and grastrointestinal distress
